incomeTaxes.name: Personal Income Tax (Household)
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 tax rates. France uses household-based taxation with family quotient system. Thresholds shown are for single person (quotient 1). Multiply thresholds by household quotient for family situations.

wealthTaxes.name: Real Estate Wealth Tax (IFI)
wealthTaxes.notes: 2024 IFI (Impôt sur la Fortune Immobilière). Applies only to real estate assets. Primary residence receives 30% deduction.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Securities Capital Gains Tax
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: 2024 rate. Flat tax of 30% (12.8% income tax + 17.2% social contributions). Option to use progressive income tax scale available.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Real Estate Capital Gains Tax
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: 2024 rate. 19% tax + 17.2% social contributions. Reductions apply based on holding period. Primary residence exempt.
